column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Everything was pretty good including ribeye.   What's really pathetic is that the best thing I loved about this place was the vibe
column2: setting and the free freaking bread they give you.  Yes the free bread was best thing I had all night!  God I'm such a low class loser but bread was like wow like totally n stuff.  I don't know exactly what kind of bread it was either.  Couldn't put my finger on it.  Like sour dough'ish but it isn't
column3: etc...it was like hermaphrodite of breads but it was freaking gooooood!
